Radicals who write their own stories are the real #CHANGEMAKERS.​
The spirit to do things differently has always been in our DNA. From challenging conventional beauty to building something for the greater good, we have always moved with purpose - a fairer, more beautiful world.​

Now, along with @shefalishahofficial, @baladevi_10, and @pilot_annydivya, we are unfolding stories of resilience, moments of power & the freedom to be YOU. We are amplifying real stories of real CHANGE.​

Discover the beauty of change with us. You can be a changemaker too. ​
